name: Police Toss - Elite Target Shot
description:
Good Design of the police car and the surroundings
A good time killer and addictive game
_________________________________

You do not get the chance to throw a paper ball in a police car’s window in real life. Well, you can do such thing in this game. The police car is parked with a slight tilt with one window open. You just have to throw paper balls in the car. But it is not as easy as it seems. For more realistic experience, developers have also added the wind factor in it. You have to adjust the speed of your throw and the direction according the speed and direction of the wind. Throw as much paper balls in the car as you can to get high score.

+++Game Features+++

‘Tap and Swing’ Game
Cool Graphics
Clear details of the animations and visual effects
